targets.expr: max by (nomad_namespace, nomad_job, nomad_taskgroup, nomad_task, hostname, pname, version, cve) (vulnerability_score[$__range])
max by (nomad_namespace, nomad_job, nomad_taskgroup, nomad_task, pname, version, cve) (vulnerability_score{nomad_namespace!=""}[$__range])
max by (nomad_job, nomad_taskgroup, nomad_task, pname, version, cve) (vulnerability_score{nomad_namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
